thread.title: Huawei Extends Professional Services Offerings to Enterprises across the Middle East
thread.title_full: Huawei Extends Professional Services Offerings to Enterprises across the Middle East | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Huawei Extends Professional Services Offerings to Enterprises across the Middle East
text:
(MENAFN Press) Huawei-a leading global information and communications technology (ICT) solutions provider-today launched a new range of Professional Services offerings for the Middle East. The Professional Services will help organizations to optimize the return on their investments in large-scale enterprise technology systems. The announcement was made during GITEX Technology Week, the region's largest annual information technology exhibition, taking place now in Dubai, UAE. 

According to Huawei, businesses in nearly every industry are under pressure to launch new products and services into the marketplace in a faster and more efficient way. While advancements in enterprise networks, mobility, cloud computing, and analytics are driving the transformation of entire industries, organizations must simultaneously ensure their business continuity. 

"Traditional industries now have an unprecedented degree of integration between information, communication and manufacturing systems at their disposal," says Eric Dai, Vice President Service â€œ Enterprise Business Group, Huawei Middle East. "With a profound understanding of ICT systems, the new Professional Services solutions from Huawei will help enterprise customers to be more efficient, safeguard their technology investments, and create a truly competitive edge from their ICT assets."

Huawei's new series of Professional Services will be part of the company's enterprise service portfolio and comprise of three major service offerings. The Agile Network Service Solution assists enterprise customers with professional services for network solution design, planning, and implementation. To ensure business continuity and protect digital assets, Huawei will also offer a Recovery & Backup Service and a Disaster Recovery Service which include project management, integrated program implementation, optimization, maintenance, and technical trainings.

The company will further enable service partners through a highly skilled Professional Services team with expertise in multiple industries, vendor technologies, and an average of 20 years' experience in the ICT sector.

Globally, Huawei provides services to enterprise customers that cover the entire network lifecycle. This includes a range of Professional Services, Customer Support Services and Learning Services. As market and business requirements evolve, Huawei's service team-together with its ecosystem partners-aim to deliver a consistently high-quality service that significantly enhances the value of the entire ICT solution. 

Within the Middle East, Huawei's enterprise business group already offers a broad portfolio of ICT solutions that cater to enterprise customers across the government and public sector, healthcare, education, oil & gas, transportation, and more. 

About Huawei 
Huawei is a leading global information and communications technology (ICT) solutions provider. Our aim is to enrich life and improve efficiency through a better connected world, acting as a responsible corporate citizen, innovative enabler for the information society, and collaborative contributor to the industry. Driven by customer-centric innovation and open partnerships, Huawei has established an end-to-end ICT solutions portfolio that gives customers competitive advantages in telecom and enterprise networks, devices and cloud computing. Huawei's 170,000 employees worldwide are committed to creating maximum value for telecom operators, enterprises and consumers. Our innovative ICT solutions, products and services are used in more than 170 countries and regions, serving over one-third of the world's population. Founded in 1987, Huawei is a private company fully owned by its employees. For more information, please visit Huawei online at www.huawei.com or follow us on:http://www.linkedin.com/company/Huaweihttp://www.twitter.com/Huaweihttp://www.facebook.com/Huaweihttp://www.google.com/Huaweihttp://www.youtube.com/HuaweiHuawei Enterprise Business GroupThe Enterprise Business Group service offerings focus on the enterprise infrastructure, enterprise communications, data centers, and industry applications. To support the cloud computing era and innovative new business models, the Enterprise Business Group also provides cloud computing-based data center and enterprise applications. The Enterprise Business Group has set up departmental organizations in over 100 countries and regions.By leveraging its years of technical expertise and unmatched R&D capabilities, the Enterprise Business group is well-positioned to grow together with customers and partners for the future cloud computing and ICT convergence era.
